snippet: At least 69 suspects accused of plotting an Islamist coup in the United Arab Emirates received prison sentences of up to 15 years on Tuesday.
abstract: At least 69 suspects accused of plotting Islamist coup in United Arab Emirates receive prison sentences of up to 15 years in mass trial that underscores widening crackdowns on dissent across entire Gulf Arab region.
lead_paragraph: At least 69 suspects accused of plotting an Islamist coup in the United Arab Emirates received prison sentences of up to 15 years on Tuesday.

headline.main: United Arab Emirates: Suspects in Coup Plot Given Prison Terms
headline.print_headline: United Arab Emirates: Suspects In Coup Plot Given Prison Terms

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
